title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 45 (Failed De
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 45 (Failed Democracy 2):

We have 35 titles here:

-  Bartels - Unequal Democracy; the Political Economy of the New Gilded Age (2008)

-  Bolleyer - New Parties in Old Party Systems; Persistence and Decline in Seventeen Democracies (2013)

-  Born & Caparini - Democratic Control of Intelligence Services; Containing Rogue Elephants (2007)

-  Breyer - Making Our Democracy Work; a JudgeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s View (2010)

-  Brock - The Republican Noise Machine; Right-Wing Media and How It Corrupts Democracy (2004)

-  Brug - The Economy and the Vote; Economic Conditions and Elections in Fifteen Countries (2007)

-  Bullock - Romancing the Revolution; the Myth of Soviet Democracy and the British Left (2011)

-  Caplan - The Myth of the Rational Voter; Why Democracies Choose Bad Policies (2006)

-  Filipwics - Democracy - the Power of Illusion (2013)

-  Fukuyama - Political Order and Political Decay; from the Industrial Revolution to the Globalization of Democracy (2014)

-  Giroux & Giroux - Take Back Higher Education; Race, Youth, and the Crisis of Democracy in the Post-Civil Rights Era (2004)

-  Greenberg & Page - The Struggle for Democracy (2014)

-  Henderson - Democracy and War; the End of an Illusion (2002)

-  Hindman - The Myth of Digital Democracy (2009)

-  Kleane - Democracy and Media Decadence (2013)

-  Kluver - Lobbying in the European Union; Interest Groups, Lobbying Coalitions, and Policy Change (2013)

-  Magaloni - Voting for Autocracy; Hegemonic Party Survival and Its Demise in Mexico (2006)

-  Mair - Ruling the Void; the Hollowing-Out of Western Democracy (2013)

-  Meguid - Party Competition between Unequals; Strategies and Electoral Fortunes in Western Europe (2008)

-  Mosley - In the Name of the People; Pseudo-Democracy and the Spoiling of Our World (2013)

-  Palast - Billionaires & Ballot Bandits; How to Steal an Election in 9 Easy Steps (2012)

-   Peled - The Challenge of Ethnic Democracy; the State and Minority Groups in Israel, Poland and Northern Ireland (2014)

-  Peleg - Democratizing the Hegemonic State; Political Transformation in the Age of Identity (2007)

-  Pevehouse - Democracy from Above; Regional Organizations and Democratization (2005)

-  Porta - Can Democracy Be Saved; Participation, Deliberation and Social Movements (2013)

-  Pottenger - Reaping the Whirlwind; Liberal Democracy and the Religious Axis (2007)

-  Raskin - Overruling Democracy; The Supreme Court vs. The American People (2003)

-  Reynolds - The Demise of the American Convention System, 1880-1911 (2006)

-  Scholzman et al - The Unheavenly Chorus; Unequal Political Voice and the Broken Promise of American Democracy (2012)

-  Schultz - Democracy and Coercive Diplomacy (2004)

-  Sitrin & Azzellini - They Can't Represent Us; Reinventing Democracy from Greece to Occupy (2014)

-  Somin - Democracy and Political Ignorance; Why Smaller Governments Is Smarter (2013)

-  Urbinati - Democracy Disfigured; Opinion, Truth, and the People (2014)

-  Waterhouse - Lobbying America; the Politics of Business from Nixon to NAFTA (2014)

-  Williams - Muzzled; the Assault on Honest Debate (2011)
